title: 94/722/EC: Commission Decision of 25 October 1994 approving the programme concerning bonamiosis and marteiliosis submitted by France (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 25 October 1994 approving the programme concerning bonamiosis and marteiliosis submitted by France (Only the French text is authentic) (94/722/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme concerning bonamiosis and marteiliosis submitted by France is hereby approved.
France shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with the programme referred to in Article 1.
This Decision is addressed to France.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 October 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
